Class AdjacencyList

  • java.lang.Object
    • AdjacencyList
  • public class AdjacencyList
extends java.lang.Object
    AdjacencyList is a class that takes a list of 5 letter words and creates a web connecting words with an edit distance of one. It prints the average number of connections, number of nodes with no edges, and the nodes with the most edges.
